qas.question: What have the authorities expanded on?

answers.text: on-arrival COVID-19 testing rules to short-haul flights

paragraphs.context: Taiwan authorities expand on-arrival COVID-19 testing rules to short-haul flights

qas.question: How long is the mandatory quarantine for?
Where must the quarantine take place?

answers.text: a quarantine hotel or a designated quarantine facility
